Haytham Fayek Dr. Haytham Fayek Senior Lecturer See full profile Details College: School of Computing Technologies Department: School of Computing Technologies Campus: City Campus Australia haytham.fayek@rmit.edu.au ORCID: 0000-0002-1840-7605 Open to Masters Research or PhD student supervision Collaborative projects Industry Projects Join a web conference as a panellist or speaker Media enquiries About Dr Haytham Fayek is an artificial intelligence and machine learning researcher. His research interests are broadly in artificial intelligence, machine learning, machine reasoning, deep learning, continual learning, and machine perception.
